full_summary:
<details>
<summary>
W1941-230015: Request for Proposal - Automatic Vertical Strapping Machine
</summary>

* **Document ID**: WS3717187382 - Doc3737522063
* **Solicitation ID**: WS3717187382
* **Publication Date**: November 7, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date and Time**: December 6, 2022, at 2:00 PM EST
* **Contract Status**: Expired

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) has issued a Request for Proposal (RFP) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) for the acquisition of an automatic vertical strapping machine. This machine will be installed, used for employee training, and include a 2-year maintenance plan at the 25 Canadian Forces Supply Depot (CFSD) located in Montréal, Québec, Canada.

**Contract Details**

* ** Contract Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
* **Classification Code**: UNSPSC 24141500 - Securing and Protecting Supplies
* **Trade Agreement**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Delivery Location**: Montréal, Québec, Canada

**Proposal Submission**

All proposal submissions must be received by the expiry date and time mentioned above. Late submissions will be considered non-responsive. The proposal submission must include all required supporting documentation and be submitted through the provided hyperlink [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14565191](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14565191).

**Contact Information**

For any questions or clarification, please contact the following individual:
Julie Carbonneau, PSPC/TPSGC
*Email:* [julie.carbonneau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:julie.carbonneau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
*Phone:* 
*Fax:* 

</details>
